AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya: Defendant convicted of conspiracy to commit hostage taking and seeking relief from his sentence

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Adrian Almaguer: Attorney for Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya, whose performance is being questioned
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Nancy F. Atlas: Judge reviewing Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya's motion for relief from his sentence
